LanguageData.MarriageName_AlwaysMans.label: always man's
LanguageData.MarriageName_AlwaysMans.description: Couples must share the man's name.
LanguageData.MarriageName_AlwaysWomans.label: always woman's
LanguageData.MarriageName_AlwaysWomans.description: Couples must share the woman's name.
LanguageData.MarriageName_KeepNames.label: keep names
LanguageData.MarriageName_KeepNames.description: Both partners keep their names upon marriage.
LanguageData.MarriageName_Random.label: random
LanguageData.MarriageName_Random.description: Couples randomly choose whether to share a name, and which name to share.
LanguageData.MarriageName_UsuallyWomans.label: usually woman's
LanguageData.MarriageName_UsuallyWomans.description: Most couples share the woman's name.
